name: indicate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: indicate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to show, point, or make clear in another way

example.eg: Exploratory investigations have indicated large amounts of oil below the sea bed.
example.egtrans: 勘测调查表明海床下有大量的石油。

example.eg: Please indicate which free gift you would like to receive.
example.egtrans: 请标出你想要哪种免费礼物。

example.eg: She indicated to me (that) she didn't want me to say anything.
example.egtrans: 她向我表示希望我什么都不要说。

dsense.name: indicate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to show other road users that you intend to turn left or right when you are driving a vehicle
trans_examp.trans_cn: 打转向灯指示（车行方向）

trans_examp.trans_en: When a device indicates a value or change, it signals it.

example.eg: The gauge indicates a temperature below freezing.
example.egtrans: 测量器显示温度在冰点以下。

dsense.name: indicate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to suggest something as being suitable

example.eg: Antihistamine is indicated for this patient as a treatment for her allergies.
example.egtrans: 建议用抗组胺药来治疗这名病人的过敏症。

example.eg: I'm so hot and tired - I think a long cool drink is indicated!
example.egtrans: 我又热又累——需要来一大杯冷饮！
